title: Black screen problem with client
body: How can I fix this please?

replies.body: One thing you could try is resetting your Internet Options to default, and then setting the security level to 'Medium-Low'.

On most versions of Windows, you can do this by going into your Control Panel, search "internet" and then clicking "Internet Options". Then search through each available option and find its equivalent of "reset options" or "restore to defaults".

After that, go to the security tab and select "Medium-Low".

Mac requires entirely different instructions.

Ok found new suggestions, would appreciate if you could let me know if it works. 

Pressed Play button but login screen is black

*     Delete **LolClient**
*     File is located in: ***\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_air_client\releases\xyz\ deploy**   "xyz" is a numbered folder that can vary depending on the current version of the game. If there is more than one folder, pick the highest number.
* Run the repair tool built into the Patcher.

So this is after clicking the launch button? Or after logging in with user/pass?
Or just what pops up when you open LOL? 


Here are some basic trouble shooting steps for now, when you reply i should be able to work out some thing else. 

____
Close all nonessential programs
____
right click the start button and select Command prompt (admin)
 then type,  chkdsk /scan

Let that run and it will give you a report if you need to do more work after, at the same time open another admin cmd and type.
sfc /scannow

That will run a scan of the protected windows system files and let you know every thing is ok.
Now once both of those are done right click start button again and go in to control panel.
Then, System and Security >> Windows update
Take note of the "Updates last installed on" Date for me?
Then check for updates and install any pending ones. 
If you are up to date let me know.
